name: Carnivore Land
description: Like to chew gum and shoot zombies? Yeah? Cause we’re all outta gum… luckily, there is no shortage of zombies, weapons and ammo in this damned city... Carnivore Land, come for the thrill stay for the kills!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Inter Core 2 Duo 3.16Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD HD 4600 1GB / nVidia GT 720 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Carnivore Land requires a 64-bit operating system.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R7 360 2GB / nVidia GTX 750 2GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Carnivore Land requires a 64-bit operating system.
